baseline.notes: Official baseline reference for progress tracking toward 18% body fat target.

workouts.details: Chest press 7.5kg 3x10; dumbbell straight raise 8kg 3x10 and 10kg 1x10; tricep rope down 15kg 2x10; treadmill 10 mins (speed 3, elevation 3); elliptical 2 mins.
Plank 30s x2; dead bug 10x2; bird dog 10x2; side toe touches 20x2; leg raises 10x2; glute bridges 10x3.
Walking-only day (Apple Watch stats shared in chat images).
Plank 40s (2 reps); dead bug 10x3; bird dog 10x3; glute bridge 10x3; butterfly hip swings 20x3; side heel crunches 10x3; leg raises 10x2 + outdoor walking.

Chest press 14kg 3x10; lat pull 21kg 3x10; incline press 14kg 3x10; goblet squat 15kg 3x10; lunges 10kg 10/leg; lateral raise 8kg 3x10; treadmill 10 mins (speed 3, incline 3); back pull 14kg 3x10; dead hang 30s x2.

Chest press 21kg 10x3; lat pull 35kg 10x3; shoulder press 14kg 10x2 + 7kg 10x1; seated row 21kg 10x3; goblet stand-to-sit squat 20kg 10x2; lateral raise 8kg 10x3; farmer walk 20kg both hands 1 min; dead hang 35 sec.
Chest press 21kg 10x3; lat pull 35kg 10x3; shoulder press 14kg 10x3; seated row 21kg 10x3; elliptical 10 mins; dead hang 30 sec; goblet squats 20kg 10x2.
Walking-only day (Apple Watch stats shared in chat images).

Chest press 21kg 10x3; lat pull 35kg 10x3; goblet squat 20kg 10x1; shoulder press 14kg 10x3; lateral raise 8kg 10x2; dead hang 30 sec; farmer carry 20kg each hand 1:30; treadmill walk 20 mins (speed 3, incline 5); leg extension 7kg 10x2; leg curl 7kg 10x2.

Home core: plank 40s; glute bridges 10x3; dead bug 10x3; bird dog 10x3; side ankle touches 10x3; leg raise 5x3. Gym: treadmill 30 mins (speed 3, incline 3); chest press 14kg 10x3; shoulder press 7kg 10x3; dead hang 30 sec; farmer carry 20kg 1:30; leg extension 7kg 10x2; leg curl 7kg 5x3.
Shoulder press 14kg 10x3; seated row 21kg 10x3; goblet squat 20kg x10; dead hang 30 sec; chest press 21kg 10x3; lat pull 28kg 10x3; farmer carry 20kg each 1:30; elliptical 10 mins.

Chest press 21kg 10x3; shoulder press 14kg 10x3; dead hang 30 sec; squat 20kg 10x2; lat pull 35kg 10x3; seated row 21kg 10x3; lateral raise 8kg 10x1; elliptical 8 mins; leg extension 7kg 10x2; leg curls 7kg 10x2.

Lat pull 35kg 10x3; seated row 21kg 10x3; goblet squat 20kg 10x2; chest press 21kg 10x3; shoulder press 14kg 10x3; wrist twists 12kg 10x2; lateral raise 10kg 10x2; dumbbell biceps 12kg 10x2; wood chop 17.5kg 10x1 each side; dead hang 30s; leg extension 21kg 10x2; leg curl 14kg 5x3.
